name: BeWelcome Develoeprs
tagline: The single, authoritative homepage for all BeWelcome development
body:
## Welcome to BeWelcome Developers Site
There are a lot of different resources for BeWelcome development. This page is intended as the single authoritative source of information on BeWelcome development. This should contain links to all the other resources. New developers can be pointed here.

## Mailing List
The mailing list is mailman at [bw-dev-discussion](http://lists.bewelcome.org/mailman/listinfo)

## Rox
Rox is the codename for the software that runs www.bewelcome.org today (Jan 2014).

* http://trac.bewelcome.org/
* There are others missing, please add them and remove this notice

## Welen
Welen is the project to develop the next generation of open source hospitality exchange.

* http://welen.org/
* There are others missing, please add them and remove this notice

## Other resources
At the time of writing, I know these resources exist, but I don't know where they fit into the whole picture. Please update this page if you know.
* Redmine (url unknown, please post)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
